definition: (of an expanse of water) vast/distant and indistinct/tiny or insignificant
vast, with no clear boundary/fig. hazy/indistinct/unclear/confused
not knowing what to do next/at a loose end

sentences.english: As a result, most women are left to care for the home with little hope of a future.
sentences.chinese: 結果，女性只能留下來看家，前途一片渺茫。

sentences.english: He was sad, and his thought about future was very somber .
sentences.chinese: 他很不快樂，對未來感到前途渺茫。

sentences.english: Revenue sharing seems a forlorn hope.
sentences.chinese: 分享收入似乎希望渺茫。

sentences.english: Nokia's path is certain pain followed by an uncertain future.
sentences.chinese: 諾基亞的前進道路上必然荊棘叢生，前途渺茫。

sentences.english: The star mountain became a dream of fair land.
sentences.chinese: 星的山成了一個渺茫的夢。

sentences.english: I hope to draw a prizewinning ticket, but very is actually uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 我盼望中大獎，可是卻很渺茫。

sentences.english: Her scheme of being a movie star is a wild-goose chase.
sentences.chinese: 她想成爲電影明星的計劃可以說是希望渺茫。

sentences.english: Confident lights once out, the road of life will become slim.
sentences.chinese: 自信的燈一旦熄滅，生活的路就會變得渺茫。

sentences.english: Ren ying ying feel hopeless request have agreed with her to see make fox blunt.
sentences.chinese: 任盈盈覺得希望渺茫請求任我行同意她去見見令狐沖。

sentences.english: The mountain of stars turned into a dream far far away.
sentences.chinese: 星的山成了一個渺茫的夢。

sentences.english: The chances of Linda becoming a neurosurgeon are about one in a googol.
sentences.chinese: 琳達要當神經外科醫生可真是希望渺茫。

sentences.english: The light at the end of the tunnel is dim at best.
sentences.chinese: 希望如同隧道口的光芒般渺茫。

sentences.english: The pitch darkness and the dank mist made him feel more lost.
sentences.chinese: 夜還很黑，空中有些溼冷的霧氣，心中更覺得渺茫。

sentences.english: Experience suggests that the chances of success for all three are poor.
sentences.chinese: 經驗暗示着這三項努力成功的機會很渺茫。

sentences.english: Vain laments, slim fantasy, crushed into small thorn headlong into the atrium.
sentences.chinese: 徒勞的感嘆，渺茫的幻想，碾碎成了小刺扎進了心房。

sentences.english: Even with the recommended chemotherapy, the prognosis was bleak.
sentences.chinese: 即使按醫囑進行化療，預後也很渺茫。

definition: hanging in the balance/the future is hard to forecast/¿Qué serà?/who knows what the future holds?
not knowing what to do next/at a loose end
far in the indefinite future (idiom); so far away it seems forever
to stand a good chance/to have great hopes/to be promising
a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
to be shattered/to be annihilated (of hope, illusions etc)
to stake all on one throw
